about_the_game: Hack, Slash, Parry and Dodge your foes in this Souls-like Action RPG. Explore the countryside in search of The Devil Fragment while fighting enemies with a multi game inspired combat system where you can launch foes into the air and then juggle them to build your combo meter for multiple buffs.

content_descriptors.notes:
The developers describe the content like this:

Dead Wells: The Devil Fragment includes stylized character death scenes when a player hits zero health. Some enemies also explode into gibs.
